channel.title: Rodgers M Gitau
channel.description: Recent content on Rodgers M Gitau

item.title: about
item.description: A bit more about me … I’m Rodgers M Gitau, a software engineer based in Nairobi, Kenya. I specialize in building web applications that are performant, accessible and focused on the user experience. My professional journey started with a regular IT desk job with a leading hospitality group. During this period of about 5 years, I tried to get into coding but with so much work to do, I never actually begun.
